amendment.description: Amendment prevented use of funds in the bill for increasing the deductible veterans must pay to receive their mileage reimbursement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to carry out section 111(c)(5) of title 38, United States Code, during fiscal year 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
